column4: is amarok crashing on anyone after doing the install libmad0 libxine-extracodecs ?
ah, can't say - works fine on gnome though - consider amarok 1.4 though
nope - it's latest - 1.3.9 is in the stock repos
Do you just happen to know if amarok will ONLY work with the xine engine?
you installed fglrx-kernel-2.6.15-25-386        assuming you're running a 386 kernel, I'd recommend 686 personally
apt-get install linux-image-2.6.15-25-686            & reboot (will only work on p4 or better)
you should probly uninstall the ubuntu-fglrx-386 first
uninstall  ubuntu-fglrx-386 first, then install linux-image-2.6.15-25-686
you can leave that - just reboot - the 686 wont use the 386 modules
did you bring the bound IP back up?
sounds like you just need to restart mysql
I've just installed a gigabit NIC... thought i'd broken things then
